subject: p13979643
Findings: A single portable chest film was obtained. A tip of a newly placed NG tube is now seen around the level of the diaphragmatic hiatus. Lung volumes are low, accentuating the pulmonary vasculature.
Impression: Replaced NG tube tip near the gastroesophageal junction. It should be advanced further into the stomach and a repeat film taken before use. Findings were discussed with Dr. Telephone at on .
